tags.name: Consents
tags.description: Set of endpoints used to manage user consents

tags.name: Consent authorisation
tags.description: Set of endpoints used for consent authorisations

post.description: Creates a draft consent defining a list of accounts the user would allow accessing via respective TPP

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

parameters.description: PSU personal ID code/Company's registration code (for validation purpose)

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Access token issued by the authorization server

frequencyPerDay.description: Maximum frequency of requests allowed per day. The frequency must be between 1 and 4 per day. For a one-off access, this attribute is set to "1".

recurringIndicator.description: Indicator of the recurring access to the account. true, if the consent is for recurring access to the account data. false, if the consent is for one access to the account data

combinedServiceIndicator.description: Indicator of combined account information and payments services in one session (currently not supported)

frequencyPerDay.description: Maximum frequency of requests allowed per day. The frequency must be between 1 and 4 per day. For a one-off access, this attribute is set to "1".

recurringIndicator.description: Indicator of the recurring access to the account. true, if the consent is for recurring access to the account data. false, if the consent is for one access to the account data

combinedServiceIndicator.description: Indicator of combined account information and payments services in one session (currently not supported)

lastActionDate.description: Date of the last change of consent status

name.description: Name of the person who has signed the consent

surname.description: Surname of the person who has signed the consent

created.description: Date and time the consent was signed
